about.title: About this app
about.section1: This weather app was build as a school project using technologies like React, TypeScript and Tailwind. It provides real-time weather information, forecasts, and allows to bookmark locations. The slick UI was built using components provided by shadcn/ui
about.weather.content: Weather data is sourced from the Openweather API
about.author: Made by Damian Gorol
